TopicTitle: Keep Apoapsis and Periapsis On in 0.24?

Articles.Content:
Is it just me? or did you used to be able to click on the Apoapsis and Periapsis in map mode in order to leave them visible as you made actual (or maneuver mode) adjustments? I don't seem to be able to do this in the new version.

Is there a new way to keep them visible that I don't know about?

Thanks!

Matt
